data.text: @KiraR @ianmSC How do masks not stop spikes? The data clearly shows they do. Spike starts... mask mandate enacted and 3 weeks later spike flattens and mask mandate lifted. Pretty easy to see.

@KiraR @ianmSC This is his tweet.. "Cases in Rhode Island rose 6x higher after they reinstated the mask mandate on December 20th and have dropped 63% since the mandate was lifted over two weeks ago"

IT'S MISINFORMATION. The spikes are clearly seen before the mask mandate was put in place.
@bpfocus @KiraR @ianmSC And if you think masks prevent spikes you are beyond help.
@bpfocus @ianmSC It’s not rocket science that the mask had no influence either way. How many charts do you need?
@bpfocus @ianmSC Where did I say masks caused spikes. I said masks don’t STOP spikes. They make no difference either way.
@ianmSC Look at the trend prior to reinstating the mask mandate. It’s going up so they reacted. Then trend started going down so they lifted it. It’s not rocket science.
@ianmSC Perhaps we are healthier when we breathe free and happier I would think. Worked before.
@ianmSC @GarySidley Lol not sure if this is sarcastic or you believe it is true
@CorolationBird @fynn_fan @ianmSC @luigi_warren It means they are arbitrary and don’t do anything
